Navigation

Breadcrumbs

  • Place the breadcrumb in a nav element with role="navigation". The nav element is also marked-up with aria-label="Breadcrumbs" to describe the type of navigation.
Info and Relationships - Information, structure, and relationships conveyed through presentation can be programmatically determined or are available in text.
  1. Grandparent page
  2. Parent page
  3. Current page
